--- title: LS 빅데이터 스쿨 Homework 1 author: 이태현 date: '2024-07-15' categoty: - bigdata --- 2024-07-15(월) homework1 # p.84 혼자서 해보기 #### Q1. 다음 표의 내용을 데이터 프레임으로 만들어 출력해 보세요. ::: {#6d890cfc .cell execution_count=1} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd df_fruit = pd.DataFrame({'제품' : ['사과', '딸기', '수박'], '가격' : [1800, 1500, 3000], '판매량' : [24, 38, 13] }) df_fruit ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=1} ```{=html}
제품 가격 판매량
0 사과 1800 24
1 딸기 1500 38
2 수박 3000 13
``` ::: ::: #### Q2. 앞에서 만든 데이터 프레임을 이용해 과일의 가격 평균과 판매량 평균을 구해 보세요. ::: {#987a4054 .cell execution_count=2} ``` {.python .cell-code} price_mean = sum(df_fruit['가격']) / 3 price_mean ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2} ``` 2100.0 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#4b337767 .cell execution_count=3} ``` {.python .cell-code} sell_mean = sum(df_fruit['판매량']) / 3 sell_mean ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3} ``` 25.0 ``` ::: ::: # p.115 혼자서 해보기 #### Q1. `mpg` 데이터를 불러와 복사본을 만드세요. ::: {#26408b5d .cell execution_count=4} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd mpg = pd.read_csv('C:/Users/USER/Documents/LS빅데이터스쿨/portfolio/data/mpg.csv') mpg_new = mpg.copy() mpg ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=4} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl category
0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact
1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact

232 volkswagen passat 2.8 1999 6 manual(m5) f 18 26 p midsize
233 volkswagen passat 3.6 2008 6 auto(s6) f 17 26 p midsize

234 rows × 11 columns

``` ::: ::: #### Q2. 복사본 데이터를 이용해 `cty`는 `city`로, `hwy`는 `highway`로 수정하세요. ::: {#95264115 .cell execution_count=5} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_new = mpg_new.rename(columns = {'cty' :'city','hwy' : 'highway'}) ``` ::: #### Q3. 데이터 일부를 출력해 변수명이 바뀌었는지 확인해 보세요. 다음과 같은 결과물이 출력되어야 합니다. ::: {#15d87d43 .cell execution_count=6} ``` {.python .cell-code} mpg_new.head() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6} ```{=html}
manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv city highway fl category
0 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 auto(l5) f 18 29 p compact
1 audi a4 1.8 1999 4 manual(m5) f 21 29 p compact

4 audi a4 2.8 1999 6 auto(l5) f 16 26 p compact
``` ::: ::: # p.130 분석 도전 #### 문제1. `midwest.csv`를 불러와 데이터 특징을 파악하세요. ::: {#85cbbff0 .cell execution_count=7} ``` {.python .cell-code} import pandas as pd midwest = pd.read_csv('C:/Users/USER/Documents/LS빅데이터스쿨/portfolio/data/midwest.csv') midwest.info() # midwest.shape # midwest.describe() # midwest.head() # midwest.tail() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` RangeIndex: 437 entries, 0 to 436 Data columns (total 28 columns): # Column Non-Null Count Dtype --- ------ -------------- ----- 0 PID 437 non-null int64 1 county 437 non-null object 2 state 437 non-null object 3 area 437 non-null float64 4 poptotal 437 non-null int64 5 popdensity 437 non-null float64 6 popwhite 437 non-null int64 7 popblack 437 non-null int64 8 popamerindian 437 non-null int64 9 popasian 437 non-null int64 10 popother 437 non-null int64 11 percwhite 437 non-null float64 12 percblack 437 non-null float64 13 percamerindan 437 non-null float64 14 percasian 437 non-null float64 15 percother 437 non-null float64 16 popadults 437 non-null int64 17 perchsd 437 non-null float64 18 percollege 437 non-null float64 19 percprof 437 non-null float64 20 poppovertyknown 437 non-null int64 21 percpovertyknown 437 non-null float64 22 percbelowpoverty 437 non-null float64 23 percchildbelowpovert 437 non-null float64 24 percadultpoverty 437 non-null float64 25 percelderlypoverty 437 non-null float64 26 inmetro 437 non-null int64 27 category 437 non-null object dtypes: float64(15), int64(10), object(3) memory usage: 95.7+ KB ``` ::: ::: #### 문제2. `poptotal`(전체인구) 변수를 `total`로, `popasian`(아시아 인구) 변수를 `asian`으로 수정하세요. ::: {#dfd02e31 .cell execution_count=8} ``` {.python .cell-code} midwest = midwest.rename(columns = {'poptotal' : 'total', 'popasian' : 'asian'}) ``` ::: #### 문제3. `total`,`asian` 변수를 이용해 '전체 인구 대비 아시아 인구 백분율' 파생변수를 추가하고, 히스토그램을 만들어 분포를 살펴보세요. ::: {#ccdf87ff .cell execution_count=9} ``` {.python .cell-code} midwest['ratio'] = midwest['asian'] / midwest['total'] * 100 midwest ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=9} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: ::: {#b2ece183 .cell execution_count=10} ``` {.python .cell-code} midwest['ratio'].plot.hist() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-11-output-1.png){width=593 height=411} ::: ::: #### 문제4. 아시아 인구 백분율 전체 평균을 구하고, 평균을 초과하면 `large`, 그 외에는 `small`을 부여한 파생변수를 만들어 보세요. ::: {#6b454199 .cell execution_count=11} ``` {.python .cell-code} ratio_mean = midwest['ratio'].mean() ratio_mean ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=11} ``` 0.4872461834357345 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#a64098aa .cell execution_count=12} ``` {.python .cell-code} import numpy as np midwest['size'] = np.where(midwest['ratio'] > ratio_mean, 'large', 'small') midwest ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=12} ```{=html}

``` ::: ::: #### 문제5. `large`와 `small`에 해당하는 지역이 얼마나 많은지 반도표와 빈도 막대 그래프를 만들어 확인해 보세요. ::: {#dbb172a8 .cell execution_count=13} ``` {.python .cell-code} count = midwest['size'].value_counts() count ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=13} ``` size small 318 large 119 Name: count, dtype: int64 ``` ::: ::: ::: {#4acd83e4 .cell execution_count=14} ``` {.python .cell-code} count.plot.bar(rot=0) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/cell-15-output-1.png){width=575 height=429} ::: :::
